{{disambig-more|The Fellowship of the Ring|[[The Fellowship of the Ring (disambiguation)]]}}
{{album
| image = The Lord of the Rings - The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack.jpg

'''''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack''''' is an album comprising of the soundtrack from the theatrical release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''. It was released [[20 November]], [[2001]]. An extended soundtrack, based on the extended edition of the film, was later released as ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - The Complete Recordings]]''.

==Contents==
# [[The Prophecy]] (3:55)
# [[Concerning Hobbits (soundtrack)|Concerning Hobbits]] (2:55)
# [[The Shadow Of The Past (soundtrack)|The Shadow Of The Past]] (3:33)
# [[The Treason Of Isengard]] (3:51)

# [[A Knife In The Dark (soundtrack)|A Knife In The Dark]] (3:34)
# [[Flight To The Ford (soundtrack)|Flight To The Ford]] (4:14)
# [[Many Meetings (soundtrack)|Many Meetings]] (3:05)
# [[The Council Of Elrond (soundtrack)|The Council of Elrond]], featuring the song "[[Aníron]]" (Theme For Aragorn And Arwen) composed and performed by [[Enya]] (3:49)
# [[The Ring Goes South (soundtrack)|The Ring Goes South]] (2:02)
# [[A Journey In The Dark (soundtrack)|A Journey In The Dark]] (4:20)
# [[The Bridge of Khazad-dûm (soundtrack)|The Bridge of Khazad-dum]] (5:57)
# [[Lothlórien (soundtrack)|Lothlorien]] (4:33)
# [[The Great River (soundtrack)|The Great River]] (2:43)
